name: Ext_R5_Composition_subject
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Composition.subject for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Composition.subject from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Composition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Who and/or what the composition is about
element.definition: Who or what the composition is about. The composition can be about a person, (patient or healthcare practitioner), a device (e.g. a machine) or even a group of subjects (such as a document about a herd of livestock, or a set of patients that share a common exposure).
element.comment: `Composition.subject` maps to R4 `Composition.subject`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
